name: Dino Defence HD
description:
*** New lower price! For a limited time! ***
Get ready for prehistoric fun with Dino Defence!

Protect your eggs from charging hoards of reptilian predators! As a relentless swarm of carnivorous dinos comes after your eggs, you must repel them using a battery of ingenious dino defences.

Play 10 different levels in three distinct environments, each with their own challenges. Earn awesome new abilities, watch out for treacherous traps and collect cool power-ups in this fast-paced battle for survival!

Dino Defence is brought to you by the makers of Dino Dan, the hit CGI/live-action adventure.
